snippet.title: Sadhguru - Like and Dislike, the Basis of Bondage #SadhguruOnKarma
snippet.description:
â€œI like this; I donâ€™t like this.â€ This one division, says Sadhguru, is the basis of bondage. If you can transcend it, 90% of the spiritual work is done. If you can bow down to everything as Shiva, as this culture taught, then you need not go in search of God and truth â€“ it will rain upon you.

#Sadhguru
Yogi, mystic and visionary, Sadhguru is a spiritual master with a difference. An arresting blend of profundity and pragmatism, his life and work serves as a reminder that yoga is a contemporary science, vitally relevant to our times.
